channel.title: terraform on Yet another one DevOps blog

item.title: Terraform 0.11 and 0.12 side-by-side
item.description: This is a guide how to install: terraform 0.11 and 0.12 terragrunt 0.18 and 0.19 side by side on MacOS X. Intro I use terraform and terragrunt to automate our AWS IT infrastructure. Recently Hashicorp released major terraform upgrade. The main point - upgrade from HCL 1 to HCL 2 (HCL is a language that terraform uses to describe IT infra setup. There are a lot of useful features in HCL 2 so effort spent on upgrade from terraform 0.
